sentences.en: But pre - race nerves this year are afflicting the sport as a whole asas the drivers themselves.
sentences.cn: 但今年,赛前紧张不仅折磨着车手,同样也折磨着整项赛事.

sentences.en: I had heard nothing of the troubles afflicting that place.
sentences.cn: 我当时从未听说有关困扰当地的麻烦.

sentences.en: Is verse 75 true of Joseph? Was the LORD afflicting him? Or was it Potiphar's wife who had afflicted him?
sentences.cn: 75节是约瑟的真实写照吗？是神在让他受苦吗？或者让他受苦的是波提乏的妻子？

sentences.en: It is perhaps the single most effective treatment for Raynaud's disease , a condition mainly afflicting women.
sentences.cn: 也可能是治疗雷诺氏病最有效的方法;这种病主要发生在妇女身上.

trans.tran_cn: 使受痛苦，折磨( afflict的现在分词 )
